text: Radik Vodopyanov (born 20 August 1984, ) is a former Kyrgystani footballer, having represented the national team from 2004 to 2007. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Kyrgyzstani footballers Category:Kyrgyzstan international footballers Category:Footballers at the 2006 Asian Games Category:FC Dordoi Bishkek players Category:FC Alga Bishkek players Category:Association football central defenders Category:Sportspeople from Bishkek
title: Radik Vodopyanov
